body: We currently have a bunch of platform-dependent code that can be replaced by libev, in particular the timer handling (monotonic clock) and the TCP server epoll code. See http://search.cpan.org/~mlehmann/EV-4.21/libev/ev.pod#The_special_problem_of_being_too_early and other "special problems" for reasons why event loops are hard, and doing our own is a bad idea.

comment_data.body: Low latency API will do this.

title: Use libev for the event loop.
